title: Interpol
content:
One of the most mysterious and secretive bands around, Interpol return this year with their fourth, as yet untitled record. Yesterday they made the first song Lights available to download for free from their official website, and whilst they are not covering any new ground or reinventing themselves, it is a welcome return from the New York band. A slow burning opening gives way to an Interpol sound much coveted on 2007’s Our Love To Admire, although finds Paul Banks in a darker, more isolated place, as he atones “don’t turn away, and lead me to plead in this hole of a place”. You can download Lights in exchange for your email address from the link below, let us know what you think of it.

Download From Official Site
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
